thread.title: Cleveland community reacts to death of Brush High School hockey player
thread.title_full: Cleveland community reacts to death of Brush High School hockey player

author: Hayden Grove, cleveland.com
title: Cleveland community reacts to death of Brush High School hockey player
text:
Cleveland community reacts to death of Brush High School hockey player Brush High School.jpg A Brush High School hockey player died suddenly Tuesday night, officials said. Paramedics took him to a hospital after he experienced trouble breathing during hockey practice. (File photo) comments 
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- The Northeast Ohio community is mourning the loss of a local high school hockey player on social media. 
Following the news of the death of 17-year-old Brush High School hockey player , Alec Kornet, on Tuesday night, plenty have sent their condolences and prayers to the Brush community and Kornet's family. 
Alec died suddenly on Tuesday night, after he was rushed to Rainbow Babies and Children's Hospital. 
More details will be published as they're made available.
